com.stripe.android

Class Stripe

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stripe.android.Stripe

  • public class Stripe
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry-point to the Stripe SDK.

    Supports asynchronous and synchronous methods to access the following Stripe APIs.

    • Payment Intent API - confirm and retrieve
    • Setup Intents API - confirm and retrieve
    • Payment Methods API - create
    • Sources API - create and retrieve
    • Tokens API - create tokens for Card, BankAccount, PiiTokenParams, and AccountParams

        public boolean onPaymentResult(int requestCode,
                               @Nullable
                               android.content.Intent data,
                               @NonNull
                               ApiResultCallback<PaymentIntentResult> callback)
        Should be called via Activity#onActivityResult(int, int, Intent)}} to handle the result of a PaymentIntent automatic confirmation (see confirmPayment(Activity, ConfirmPaymentIntentParams)) or manual confirmation (see authenticatePayment(Activity, String)})

      • retrievePaymentIntentSynchronous

        @Nullable
public PaymentIntent retrievePaymentIntentSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                                java.lang.String clientSecret)
                                                         throws APIException,
                                                                AuthenticationException,
                                                                InvalidRequestException,
                                                                APIConnectionException
        Blocking method to retrieve a PaymentIntent object. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Retrieve a PaymentIntent.

        Parameters:
        clientSecret - the client_secret with which to retrieve the PaymentIntent
        Returns:
        a PaymentIntent or null if a problem occurred
        Throws:
        APIException
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException
        APIConnectionException

      • createSource

        public void createSource(@NonNull
                         SourceParams sourceParams,
                         @NonNull
                         ApiResultCallback<Source> callback)
        Create a Source asynchronously.

        See Create a source.

        Parameters:
        sourceParams - the SourceParams to be used
        callback - a ApiResultCallback to receive the result or error

      • createSourceSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Source createSourceSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                SourceParams params)
                                         throws AuthenticationException,
                                                InvalidRequestException,
                                                APIConnectionException,
                                                APIException
        Blocking method to create a Source object. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a source.

        Parameters:
        params - a set of SourceParams with which to create the source
        Returns:
        a Source, or null if a problem occurred
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers

      • retrieveSourceSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Source retrieveSourceSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String sourceId,
                                                  @NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String clientSecret)
                                           throws AuthenticationException,
                                                  InvalidRequestException,
                                                  APIConnectionException,
                                                  APIException
        Retrieve an existing Source from the Stripe API. Note that this is a synchronous method, and cannot be called on the main thread. Doing so will cause your app to crash.

        See Retrieve a source.

        Parameters:
        sourceId - the Source.getId() field of the desired Source object
        clientSecret - the Source.getClientSecret() field of the desired Source object
        Returns:
        a Source if one could be found based on the input params, or null if no such Source could be found.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)

      • createBankAccountToken

        public void createBankAccountToken(@NonNull
                                   BankAccount bankAccount,
                                   @NonNull
                                   ApiResultCallback<Token> callback)
        Create a BankAccount token asynchronously.

        See Create a bank account token.

        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the BankAccount used to create this token
        callback - a ApiResultCallback to receive the result or error

      • createBankAccountTokenSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Token createBankAccountTokenSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                         BankAccount bankAccount)
                                                  throws AuthenticationException,
                                                         InvalidRequestException,
                                                         APIConnectionException,
                                                         CardException,
                                                         APIException
        Blocking method to create a Token for a BankAccount. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a bank account token.

        Parameters:
        bankAccount - the Card to use for this token
        Returns:
        a Token that can be used for this BankAccount
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        CardException - should not be thrown with this type of token, but is theoretically possible given the underlying methods called
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers

      • createPiiToken

        public void createPiiToken(@NonNull
                           java.lang.String personalId,
                           @NonNull
                           ApiResultCallback<Token> callback)
        Create a PII token asynchronously.

        See Create a PII account token.

        Parameters:
        personalId - the personal id used to create this token
        callback - a ApiResultCallback to receive the result or error

      • createPiiTokenSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Token createPiiTokenSynchronous(@NonNull
                                                 java.lang.String personalId)
                                          throws AuthenticationException,
                                                 InvalidRequestException,
                                                 APIConnectionException,
                                                 CardException,
                                                 APIException
        Blocking method to create a Token for PII. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a PII account token.

        Parameters:
        personalId - the personal ID to use for this token
        Returns:
        a Token that can be used for this card
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers)
        CardException

                        Card card,
                        @NonNull
                        ApiResultCallback<Token> callback)

        See Create a card token.

        Parameters:

      • createTokenSynchronous

        @Nullable
public Token createTokenSynchronous(@NonNull
                                              Card card)
                                       throws AuthenticationException,
                                              InvalidRequestException,
                                              APIConnectionException,
                                              CardException,
                                              APIException
        Blocking method to create a Token. Do not call this on the UI thread or your app will crash.

        See Create a card token.

        Parameters:
        card - the Card to use for this token
        Returns:
        a Token that can be used for this card
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - failure to properly authenticate yourself (check your key)
        InvalidRequestException - your request has invalid parameters
        APIConnectionException - failure to connect to Stripe's API
        CardException - the card cannot be charged for some reason
        APIException - any other type of problem (for instance, a temporary issue with Stripe's servers
